document.full_text: the united states fell one spot to third place in clean-energy investment last year as the lack of a national energy policy hurt purchases in wind and solar power and other technologies, a report said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. drops to 3rd in clean-energy investment: pew
lines_and_colors: the united states fell one spot to third place in clean-energy investment last year as the lack of a national energy policy hurt purchases in wind and solar power and other technologies, a report said on tuesday.
